page.title: 09MADELEY STAFFS : CLUBS
page.content: From the age of 2 there are clubs to suit all tastes & ages.The Playgroup meets 3 mornings a week in the Village Hall.Here,children learn to play together & prepare for school. At 6,girls may join the Brownies & at 8,boys may join the Cubs.They learn the skills of map-reading,communicating by signs & flags,First Aid,swimming,cook- ing & more besides.They are awarded badges for achievement.At 11 Cubs may join the Scouts & at camp,in Bowsey Woods,they learn more advanced skills. A Youth Club is held twice weekly for the 12-16's to meet,talk,dance & listen to music.They play table-tennis,darts & other indoor games. Adults have several clubs.A Working Men's Club,where people can meet during opening hours for drinks & games,is run by a committee elected by members.A married barman lives on the premises.
